thread.title: Hiking trails for early Oct.

thread.title_full: Hiking trails for early Oct. - Yosemite National Park Message Board - TripAdvisor

author: PacificNWFamily
text:
Hi
Be sure you read the relevant topics in the Top Questions & Trip Ideas on the right.
Consider daylight hours: www.SunriseSunset.com
I'll wait for your answers to some of the excellent questions that have been posed.
You know that the amenities along Tioga Road ( Tuolumne Meadows store, for example) will be closed for the season, right?
Current tentative reopening of Mariposa Grove is planned for September. We'll see.
One attraction mentioned in this post 1 Tuolumne Meadows Ranked #13 of 83 things to do in Yosemite National Park 439 Reviews
